import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faEye, faEyeSlash } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' type Inputs = { username: string name: string email: string password: string password2: string } const SignUpForm: React.FunctionComponent = () => { const [{ username, password }, setRegisterData] = useState({ usernamw, }) const { register, handleSubmit, errors, watch } = useForm() const onSubmit: (data: Inputs) => void = (data: Inputs) => { console.log('data', data) alert('Registration successful!') } const [passwordShown, setPasswordShown] = useState(false) const togglePasswordVisibility: () => void = () => { setPasswordShown(!passwordShown) } const [passwordShown2, setPasswordShown2] = useState(false) const togglePasswordVisibility2: () => void = () => { setPasswordShown2(!passwordShown2) } const [iconChange, setIconChange] = useState(false) const toggleIcon: () => void = () => { setIconChange(!iconChange) } const [iconChange2, setIconChange2] = useState(false) const toggleIcon2: () => void = () => { setIconChange2(!iconChange2) } return (
{errors.username && errors.username.type === 'required' && ( )} {errors.username && errors.username.type === 'minLength' && ( )}
{errors.name && errors.name.type === 'required' && ( )} {errors.name && errors.name.type === 'minLength' && ( )}
{errors.email && errors.email.type === 'required' && ( )}
{errors.password && errors.password.type === 'required' && ( )} {errors.password && errors.password.type === 'minLength' && ( )}
{ return value === watch('password') }, })} />
{errors.password2 && errors.password2.type === 'required' && ( )} {errors.password2 && errors.password2.type === 'validate' && ( )}
) } export default SignUpForm
